# PDFium XFA fixtures

These PDFs are copied from the PDFium project and used as real-world-ish fixtures for
manual/regression testing of OpenDroidPDF’s XFA detection + the optional “XFA Pack”
conversion flows.

## Sources (retrieved 2026-01-08)
- `dynamic_password_field_background_fill.pdf`
  - Origin: `testing/resources/pixel/xfa_specific/dynamic_password_field_background_fill.pdf`
  - URL: `https://pdfium.googlesource.com/pdfium/+/refs/heads/main/testing/resources/pixel/xfa_specific/dynamic_password_field_background_fill.pdf?format=TEXT`
  - SHA256: `cd34ed4148c7a49488e5c12d49ec7e5196fe5351d8bc9a2b3fb6e6f454bba6af`
- `static_password_field_rotate.pdf`
  - Origin: `testing/resources/pixel/xfa_specific/static_password_field_rotate.pdf`
  - URL: `https://pdfium.googlesource.com/pdfium/+/refs/heads/main/testing/resources/pixel/xfa_specific/static_password_field_rotate.pdf?format=TEXT`
  - SHA256: `464aa3780a3db1e001ead9fd14be46fd1a470bbfe4daf41f4e51ee6278ee13e3`
- `simple_xfa.pdf`
  - Origin: `testing/resources/simple_xfa.pdf`
  - URL: `https://pdfium.googlesource.com/pdfium/+/refs/heads/main/testing/resources/simple_xfa.pdf?format=TEXT`
  - SHA256: `82e0af732b472b023b3c50940cac0d76b6a84c25dab2b4a8de79fd0a6b7cdb89`
